synopsis.text:
This thrilling anime revolves around the mischievous and enigmatic Pokémon, Hoopa, who possesses the extraordinary ability to summon anything, including legendary Pokémon, through its magical rings. However, a century ago, Hoopa's formidable and sinister form, known as Unleashed Hoopa, was sealed away in a special bottle by a solitary traveler to protect the world from its destructive power.

In the present day, the peaceful desert city of Dahara becomes the epicenter of chaos when a young man accidentally releases the malevolent force from the bottle. Ash, Pikachu, and their friends encounter the playful Hoopa and find themselves entangled in a dangerous battle between the two forms of Hoopa, each summoning legendary Pokémon to gain the upper hand.

As the city faces imminent destruction, Ash and his friends must help Hoopa conquer its greatest fear – its own dark side. In this perilous journey, they uncover an ominous secret and a grand destiny that could change everything. Can Ash and his friends prevent the unleashed Hoopa's wrath from causing a catastrophic clash of legends, or will the world succumb to the darkness within?
